take a ticket:
v. [*transitive verb 他動詞]
1. move forward, proceed with (something)
2. work on
be in time, make a deadline
v. reschedule to an earlier time
n. time / money / space (to spare), have room in someone's mind
n. in the middle of, halfway
v.  be responsible for, be in charge of

チケットを取る: ミーティングを抜ける

take a ticket: adv. at the last moment, barely
v. delegate, leave something with someone
adv. at the same time, simultaneously
adv. after all, in the end
